text: Fernanda Ignacia Araya Toloza (born 12 October 1994) is a Chilean footballer who plays as a left winger for American college OVU Fighting Scots and the Chile women's national team. ==International career== Araya represented Chile at the 2014 South American U-20 Women's Championship. At senior level, she played the 2014 South American Games and the 2014 Copa América Femenina. ===International goals=== Scores and results list Chile's goal tally first {| class="wikitable" |- !
